docs.lead_paragraph: Some experts said the report indicated that the disorder is being diagnosed and treated with medication in children far too often, and that steeply rising diagnoses among adults might portend similar problems.

headline.main: Report Says Medication Use Is Rising for Adults With Attention Disorder
headline.print_headline: Report Says Medication Use Is Rising for Adults With Attention Disorder

docs.abstract: Report from Express Scripts, nation's largest prescription drug manager, shows number of young American adults taking medications for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder nearly doubled from 2008 to 2012; some experts say report indicates that disorder is being diagnosed and treated with medication in children far too often, and that steeply rising diagnoses among adults might portend similar problems.
docs.snippet: Some experts said the report indicated that the disorder is being diagnosed and treated with medication in children far too often, and that steeply rising diagnoses among adults might portend similar problems.

docs.lead_paragraph: The proposal created political problems for the Obama administration, with some Democrats joining Republicans in denouncing the changes, saying they would harm Medicare beneficiaries.

headline.main: White House Withdraws Plan Allowing Limits to Medicare Coverage for Some Drugs
headline.print_headline: White House Withdraws Plan Allowing Limits to Medicare Coverage for Some Drugs

docs.abstract: Obama administration, under pressure from patients, pharmaceutical companies and members of Congress from both parties, withdraws proposal that would have allowed insurers to limit Medicare coverage for certain classes of drugs; limitations would have included drugs used to treat depression and schizophrenia.
docs.snippet: The proposal created political problems for the Obama administration, with some Democrats joining Republicans in denouncing the changes, saying they would harm Medicare beneficiaries.
